page.content: {Education}for the children of the area involves much travelling.On reaching high_school age,young people must decide whether to{travel daily}to Ponteland {or board}at Haydon Bridge. {Here are the thoughts of 2 teenagers } "The prospect of a journey of 60 miles a day did not appeal.Boarding has its {disadvantages:}being away from home, and the restrictions imposed become tedious.{Advantages}_ I have taken part in many out_of_school activities I would otherwise have missed and boarding has prepared me for leaving home to further my education." {"The journey to school } on icy roads is often boring and monotonous.I have less time for re _ creation or homework.I don't regret living near Rochester_I feel I am an individual not just a member of another nuclear family in suburbia."
